name: Flags_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testToStringAllFlagsOff
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when all flags are off.

test_cases.name: testToStringAllFlagsOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when all flags are on.

test_cases.name: testToStringMixedFlags
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with mixed flags on.

test_cases.name: testToStringSingleFlagOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with a single flag on.

test_cases.name: testToStringSingleFlagOff
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with a single flag turned off after being turned on.
